DOC.brief_summary: This safety efficacy study evaluate experimental treatment cognitive deficit adult schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate ABT-126 Treatment Cognitive Deficits Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 study design evaluate safety efficacy ABT-126 treat cognitive deficit subject diagnosis schizophrenia . Eligible subject take study drug add-on treatment ongoing antipsychotic treatment regimen .
DOC.criteria: Has current Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) diagnosis schizophrenia confirm MiniInternational Neuropsychiatric Interview ( M.I.N.I. ) . Is clinically stable receive regimen one two allowable antipsychotic medication : lack hospitalization 4 month prior initial screen visit ; take antipsychotic medication ( ) least 8 week prior baseline visit ; core positive symptom Positive Negative Syndrome Scale ( PANSS ) bad moderate severity throughout screen period least 4 week . Has diagnose treat schizophrenia least 2 year prior initial screen visit . Has continuity psychiatric care ( e.g. , mental health system , clinic physician ) least 6 month prior initial screen visit . Has identify contact person ( e.g. , family member , social worker , case worker , nurse ) provide support subject ensure compliance protocol requirement . In Investigator 's judgment , current past diagnosis schizoaffective disorder , bipolar disorder , manic episode , dementia , post traumatic stress disorder , obsessivecompulsive disorder , subject current major depressive episode . Has positive urine drug screen cocaine , phencyclidine ( PCP ) , opiates ( unless duly prescribe ) , benzodiazepine ( unless duly prescribe ) , marijuana , amphetamines Screening Period . Has current past history seizure , exception single febrile seizure occur prior 6 year age . Has clinically significant abnormal electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Screening Visit 1 determine Investigator . Has risk factor Torsades de Pointes ( TdP )
